name: SpaceBoomers! [1Bit Weekend Jam #2 entry]
description:
So this is our Entry for the 1Bit Weekend Jam!
Mirko and I worked hard on this but i think it came out great :D

Whats this game about?
You can control a Rocket with your Mouse and have to destroy Plantes to make money.
But there's a twist
Before the game starts you mix your own fuel to give your Rocket different attributes. Over time and with enough Money you can start upgrading your fuel tank which lets you carry more fuel at a time.
The game ends when you're out of fuel or out of health from crashing into too many planets!
You can also hold down the mouse button ingame to get a boost, this will consume a lot more fuel tho!

More Projects: http://bytespace.tk/
